# Class TextEmbedder

Class for text embedding functionality. Converts text into vector representations (embeddings) for semantic processing.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy embed embedBatch

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this text embedder.

#### Returns void




### embed

  * embed(text: string): Promise<number[]>

Creates an embedding vector for a single text string.

#### Parameters

    * text: string

Text to convert to embedding

#### Returns Promise<number[]>

Promise resolving to array of numbers representing the embedding vector

#### Throws

InworldError if embedding generation fails




### embedBatch

  * embedBatch(texts: string[]): Promise<number[][]>

Creates embedding vectors for multiple text strings in a batch.

#### Parameters

    * texts: string[]

Array of text strings to convert to embeddings

#### Returns Promise<number[][]>

Promise resolving to array of embedding vectors

#### Throws

InworldError if batch embedding generation fails




### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
